posts.title: Huge Update. - 8/18/2023 by QAEZZ, The Consigliere
posts.content: The domain and new site is finally live! View the site's GitHub repository here. In the future, I'll set up a database so this site can fetch our blog posts and updates from there. As of now, it will be manually updated! If you have any suggestions for the site, joins the Discord and DM @maximumtrollage.

posts.title: I begun work on an OS. - 8/18/2023 by QAEZZ, The Consigliere
posts.content: I am currently developing an x86_64 OS called "tihsOS-64". I'm Currently working on the kernel and a basic shell. Keyboard input is succesfully working. For more information, visit the GitHub repository. This is a prelude to an OS Yendy and I are gonna be making when he finished his language Emerald.

posts.title: Welcome To Our Community Page! - 8/19/2023 by Yendy, The Owner
posts.content: Hello from the owner of THCoTD! I would like to announce and present to you our organization wide site! I also would like to announce an upcoming SWCP (Sever-wide Coding Project). For people who want to help we will soon be developing a webapp for THCoTD coms. This site will be running via TOR so we dont have to pay for hosting because that is based! (TOR coming soon for THIS site - qaezz) Anyone who wants to join the project can join our server and ask to be put on the project. As for people in the server you can also ask!
